segments.text: This morning we rented a car and we are on the way to Niagara Falls . I'm afraid we have a car accident near the border .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too bad.What kind of accident is it ? Are you all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm all right , but my friend is seriously injured.Will you call an ambulance and the police ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll do it right away , but tell me how it happened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ran into the guardrail when I turned to the left .
segments.speaker: S1
